name: Putera Nik
title: I create web apps, one commit at a time.
subtitle: My name is Nik and I'm a web apps programmer. I have a passion for building technologies, websites, applications, games and flight simulation.

projects.name: React Portfolio
projects.description: A portfolio website created using React JS with Levinson from India in a matter of 3 days via Live Share on Visual Studio Code. We started on the 12th and completed on the 15th of May.

projects.name: Blog
projects.description: Created a blog with Dot Net Core 3.1 as its backend and React JS as the frontend. I'm the backend developer with 3 other people working on the project. We started March and the project is still pending completion.

projects.name: Recipe List
projects.description: A recipe list created using the Ionic Framework. It is using Firebase as its backend and Imgur API as its image hoster.

about.summary: I think about code and systems all the time. When I'm not at my day job, I love to create web applications that solves problems.

education.title: Republic Polytechnic
education.professionalcert: Industry Connect Job Ready Software Development Course
